record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - September 26, 2007)

[Page: H10920]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I request 5 legislative days for Members to revise and extend their remarks and insert materials on H.R. 2693 into the Record.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from California?
